trans-unit.source: Main features

target.mrk: Fonctionnalités principales

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is equipped with multiple features for backup protection of workstations and file servers (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_features_and_descriptions" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is equipped with multiple features for backup protection of workstations and file servers (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_features_and_descriptions" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est équipé de multiples fonctionnalités pour la protection de sauvegarde des postes de travail et des serveurs de fichiers (<MadCap:xref href="#Lina_features_and_descriptions" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) :

target.mrk: Fonctionnalité

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Continuous Data Protection and Flexible Recovery Point Objective

seg-source.mrk: Continuous Data Protection and Flexible Recovery Point Objective

target.mrk: Protection en continu des données et flexibilité de la fréquence d’envoi des données

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> offers automatic and near continuous protection of user data. There is no backup scheduling. Instead, new or modified data is detected in real time and automatically transferred to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server, without user intervention. The time-intervals between transfers of data to protect is defined by the Recovery Point Objective (RPO). The RPO can vary from one minute to one day.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> offers automatic and near continuous protection of user data.
There is no backup scheduling.

Instead, new or modified data is detected in real time and automatically transferred to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server, without user intervention.
The time-intervals between transfers of data to protect is defined by the Recovery Point Objective (RPO).
The RPO can vary from one minute to one day.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> offre une protection automatique en quasi continu des données des utilisateurs.
Il n'y a pas de programmation des sauvegardes.

Au contraire, les modifications ou ajouts de données sont détectés en temps réel et sont automatiquement transférés vers le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, sans intervention de l'utilisateur.
La fréquence d’envoi des données à protéger est définie par la Perte des Données Maximale Admissible (PDMA).
La PDMA peut varier d'une minute à un jour.

alt-trans.seg-source: There is no backup scheduling, instead, new or modified data is detected in real time and automatically transferred to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server, without user intervention.
alt-trans.target: Contrairement à une sauvegarde traditionnelle, il n’y pas de programmation des sauvegardes : les modifications ou ajouts de données sont détectés en temps réel et sont automatiquement transférés vers le serveur <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, sans intervention de l’utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: Workstation recovery

seg-source.mrk: Workstation recovery

target.mrk: Récupération des postes de travail

trans-unit.source: The Bare Metal Recovery (herein called BMR) is a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> module used to recover a complete Windows agent (system and data). The BMR feature allows to backup and restore MS SQL Servers and requires setting a specific protection policy at backup time. This ensures that all necessary files are backed up and available if you need to perform a recovery of your machine.

seg-source.mrk: The Bare Metal Recovery (herein called BMR) is a <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> module used to recover a complete Windows agent (system and data).
The BMR feature allows to backup and restore MS SQL Servers and requires setting a specific protection policy at backup time.
This ensures that all necessary files are backed up and available if you need to perform a recovery of your machine.

target.mrk: Le Bare Metal Recovery (appelé BMR) est un module <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> utilisé pour récupérer un agent Windows complet (système et données).
La fonction BMR permet de sauvegarder et de restaurer les serveurs MS SQL et nécessite de définir une politique de protection spécifique au moment de la sauvegarde.
Cela garantit que tous les fichiers nécessaires sont sauvegardés et disponibles si vous devez effectuer une restauration de votre machine.

trans-unit.source: Block Level Deduplication

seg-source.mrk: Block Level Deduplication

target.mrk: Déduplication au niveau bloc

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> implements incremental backup and deduplication technology at block level.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> implements incremental backup and deduplication technology at block level.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> implémente une technologie de sauvegarde incrémentale et de déduplication au niveau bloc.

trans-unit.source: WAN Mode

seg-source.mrk: WAN Mode

target.mrk: Mode WAN

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> reduces network traffic since already protected blocks are not re-sent to the server.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> reduces network traffic since already protected blocks are not re-sent to the server.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> permet de réduire le trafic des données sur le réseau puisque les blocs déjà protégés ne sont pas renvoyés vers le serveur.

trans-unit.source: "Self Service" Restore of Agent Data

seg-source.mrk: "Self Service" Restore of Agent Data

target.mrk: Restauration en "libre service" des données des agents

trans-unit.source: A <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lets the user restore files or folders at any time without administrator intervention. Data can be restored to its original place or to a new location.

seg-source.mrk: A <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lets the user restore files or folders at any time without administrator intervention.
Data can be restored to its original place or to a new location.

target.mrk: L’utilisateur peut à tout moment restaurer un fichier ou un répertoire sans l’intervention de l’administrateur grâce au <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_restore_wizard" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Les données peuvent être restaurées aussi bien vers leur emplacement d’origine que vers un nouvel emplacement.

trans-unit.source: Versioning

seg-source.mrk: Versioning

target.mrk: Contrôle de version

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> keeps historical logs of protected versions, letting you choose the protection date or version of the file or directory to restore.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> keeps historical logs of protected versions, letting you choose the protection date or version of the file or directory to restore.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> conserve un historique des versions protégées, ce qui permet de choisir en fonction de la date de protection, la version du fichier ou du répertoire à restaurer.

trans-unit.source: Support of Open Files

seg-source.mrk: Support of Open Files

target.mrk: Support des fichiers ouverts

trans-unit.source: For continuous protection of user data, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protects open files. Applications such as Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Office do not need to be closed, their files are protected while in use.

seg-source.mrk: For continuous protection of user data, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protects open files.
Applications such as Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Office do not need to be closed, their files are protected while in use.

target.mrk: Pour veiller à ce que l'utilisateur soit protégé en continu, l’agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> prend en charge la protection des fichiers ouverts.
Des applications telles que Microsoft Outlook et Microsoft Office n’ont donc pas besoin d’être fermées pour que leurs fichiers ouverts soient protégés.

trans-unit.source: Support of Windows EFS

seg-source.mrk: Support of Windows EFS

target.mrk: Support des systèmes de fichiers Windows EFS (Encrypting File System)

trans-unit.source: EFS (Encrypting File Systems) encrypt data on a machine to ensure its confidentiality. When <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protects the data on an EFS system, it is protected and restored in its encrypted form.

seg-source.mrk: EFS (Encrypting File Systems) encrypt data on a machine to ensure its confidentiality.

When <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protects the data on an EFS system, it is protected and restored in its encrypted form.

target.mrk: Les systèmes de fichiers EFS permettent de chiffrer les données enregistrées sur une machine, afin d’en assurer la confidentialité.

Quand <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> protège les données sur un système EFS, elles sont protégées chiffrées et sont restaurées chiffrées également.

trans-unit.source: Network Management

seg-source.mrk: Network Management

target.mrk: Gestion du réseau

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents automatically connect to the server as soon as a network connection is available.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents automatically connect to the server as soon as a network connection is available.

target.mrk: Les agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> se connectent automatiquement au serveur dès qu’une connexion réseau est disponible.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lets you fine-tune data protection by defining, among other things, the behavior to adopt for different types of network, or the compression algorithm for data transfer.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> lets you fine-tune data protection by defining, among other things, the behavior to adopt for different types of network, or the compression algorithm for data transfer.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> permet un paramétrage fin de la protection des données en définissant, entre autres, le comportement à adopter en fonction du type de réseau utilisé, ainsi que l’algorithme de compression pour le transfert des données.

trans-unit.source: Centralized Handling of the Server, Free Configuration of the Agent

seg-source.mrk: Centralized Handling of the Server, Free Configuration of the Agent

target.mrk: Encadrement côté serveur

trans-unit.source: Administrators of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server can:

seg-source.mrk: Administrators of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server can:

target.mrk: Les administrateurs du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> peuvent :

trans-unit.source: Oversee the entire IT environment of the company (file servers, workstations and laptops).

seg-source.mrk: Oversee the entire IT environment of the company (file servers, workstations and laptops).

target.mrk: Superviser l'ensemble de l'environnement informatique de l'entreprise (serveurs de fichiers, postes de travail et ordinateurs portables).

trans-unit.source: Apply common protection policies to groups of machines through a centralized <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Apply common protection policies to groups of machines through a centralized <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Appliquer des politiques de protection communes à des groupes de machines par le biais d'une <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> centralisée.

trans-unit.source: Define enterprise-wide protection policies such as exclusions and inclusions, and rights for <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents.

seg-source.mrk: Define enterprise-wide protection policies such as exclusions and inclusions, and rights for <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agents.

target.mrk: Définir à l’échelle de l’entreprise des politiques de protection (telles que les inclusions, les exclusions, etc.) et des permissions pour les agents <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Depending on their rights, users can set up their own protection policies on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, as long as their customized policies do not conflict with the protection rules defined on the server.

seg-source.mrk: Depending on their rights, users can set up their own protection policies on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, as long as their customized policies do not conflict with the protection rules defined on the server.

target.mrk: En fonction de leurs droits, les utilisateurs peuvent définir leur propre politique de protection sur l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, tant que leur politique personnalisée n'entre pas en conflit avec les règles de protection définies au niveau du serveur.
